Html.content:
It is recommended to set up the top folder structure of the respective site according to the languages. Its good practice that the upper most folders of the site are named after their two-letter lowercase code as identified by the ISO 639-1 list. This is not mandatory but it helps to distinguish the language specific branches of the sitemap and should correspond to the configured locale property of each folder. The locale property is part of the predifined OpemCms-Properites which is used to distribute language specific content und can be inherited by resources which are part of this sub tree.
